sparksql_query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.PLT <= 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T2.PLT >= 400 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM patient AS T1 INNER JOIN laboratory AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID
